job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: description ltbrgt these contingent workers will work closely with fulltime research scientists and software engineers who are leadingltbrgt computer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly and that data annotation quality remains high toltbrgt train stateoftheart machine learning models duties includeltbrgt data wrangling writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically running existing ml models on large volumes ofltbrgt data adhoc data analysis visualizationltbrgtltbrgtannotation task and vendor management ltbrgt creating data annotation guidelines curating ideal gold standard examples for annotatorsltbrgt managing backandforth communications with annotators reviewing annotation quality to identify themes andltbrgt relaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendorsltbrgtltbrgtskills requiredltbrgt sql python linux command line bashltbrgt very high attention to detail for managing large complex annotation effortsltbrgt good written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team membersltbrgt years work experience including experience working with customer teamsltbrgtltbrgttop musthave hard skillsltbrgt sql and python is a needltbrgt linux command lineltbrgtltbrgttop goodtohave skillsltbrgt great communicationltbrgt understanding of ai models would be greatltbrgtltbrgtinterview loopprocessltbrgt coding interviews and general interviewltbrgt pdf homeworkoffline analysis will submit the answers along with their resumeltbrgt
